title: Matt Rhule Fired, TNF Preview & "Spicy, Feisty or Frisky"
itunes:title: Matt Rhule Fired, TNF Preview & "Spicy, Feisty or Frisky"
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all the latest news from around the league, starting with the Panthers firing Matt Rhule in the third year of his seven-year contract (6:46). There was another controversial roughing the passer penalty in Monday night's contest between the Chiefs and Raiders (14:13), and after the game, Davante Adams pushed a freelance photographer (20:19). Ron Rivera made regrettable comments about his quarterback (23:03), and Keenan Allen tweeted a regrettable tweet about his head coach (26:34). Marc needs a guy (31:01), and the heroes preview this week's TNF game between the Commanders and Bears, explaining why this matchup is a command-off (35:29). Then, we close the show with a fun game of "Spicy, Feisty or Frisky," discussing teams such as the Falcons, Seahawks, Cowboys, Jets, Patriots, and a handful of others (41:53).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
